example.name: Change Installer UI Example
example.description: Using a component script to modify the installer UI.

example.name: Component Error Example
example.description: Using a component script to stop the installation if the components cannot be installed.

example.name: Dependency Solving Example
example.description: Using components' package.xml files to define dependencies and automatic dependencies between components.

example.name: Dynamic Page Installer Example
example.description: Using a component script and dynamic pages to build an installer.

example.name: Hide Checkbox Example
example.description: Using components' package.xml files to hide checkboxes for items.

example.name: Modify Extract Installer Example
example.description: Using the extract archive hook in a component script to modify the target path.

example.name: Online Installer Example
example.description: Using the repogen tool and the configuration file to set up an online installer.

example.name: Open ReadMe Example
example.description: Using a component script to add a check box for opening the readme file to the final installer page.

example.name: Quit Installer Example
example.description: Using a component script to quit an installer.

example.name: Register File Extension Example
example.description: Using a component script to register a filename extension on Windows.

example.name: Repository Categories Example
example.description: Using the RepositoryCategories element to set up an online installer where repositories are grouped.

example.name: Start Menu Shortcut Example
example.description: Using a component script to add an entry to the Windows Start menu.

example.name: Stylesheet Example
example.description: Using a stylesheet to customize a UI.

example.name: System Information Example
example.description: Using the systemInfo API in a component script to check operating system version and bitness.

example.name: Translation Example
example.description: Using translations to localize installer pages and licenses.
